DOC.criteria: Healthy newborn infant Fullterm ( > 37 week gestation ) Birth weight > 2500 < 4500 g 14Â±3 day age enrollment Singleton birth Infant 's mother elect breastfeed prior enrollment Has receive solid food Having obtain his/her legal representative 's informed consent Known suspect cowmilk allergy Congenital illness malformation may affect infant feed and/or growth Significant prenatal and/or postnatal disease Any readmission hospital ( except hyperbilirubinemia ) prior enrollment Receiving prescription medication ( exception treatment thrush ) frequent use counter medication except vitamin mineral supplement Has receive oral intravenous antibiotic therapy last 7 day Has receive probiotic last 7 day Currently participate another clinical study Infant 's family Investigator 's assessment expect comply treatment ( feed regimen )
